programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Too Many People in This Relationship
programme.desc: Ta’Laiya and De’Asia have been friends since the 7th grade and stopped speaking because over a damaged wig.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Help Us Co-Parent
programme.desc: Ollie says he confessed to his wife Angel about cheating on her. Now Ollie wants to unlock Angel’s phone.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Sisters At War...Is It Mom's Fault?
programme.desc: Ladonna is desperate to fix her relationship with her older sister Taunja once and for all.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Our Love Went Viral
programme.desc: Trevor and his wife are no strangers to reality television. But Trevor says she's taken things too far.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Christmas Prank Gone Wrong
programme.desc: Latoya says that her mother Vickie led her to believe that another man was a father.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: Do You Hate Me Because I'm Not Yours?; Unlock My Phone to Prove I'm Being Honest
programme.desc: Ricardo needs to find out if Horace is his biological father; Reggie has a wife, a fiancée and a pregnant girlfriend.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My 14-Year-Old Is out of Control; We Broke Up ... Now Unlock Your Phone!
programme.desc: Keeshauna desperately wants her daughter, Kailey, to improve her behavior, and is ready to sign over parental rights so she can have peace; Alex caught his girlfriend Janiah texting multiple men and believes that she is hiding something.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Choose Your Wife Or Your Fiancée
programme.desc: On Karamo, Lashuna can’t wait to get married to the love of her life, Michael. One problem…he’s already married to a woman named Damita!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Show Me The Proof!
programme.desc: Karamo helps Diamond dig deep after feeling caught in the middle of her parents who argue over everything.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My 16-Year-Old Sister Is Out of Control / My BFF Doesn’t Care about My Trauma
programme.desc: Dionna thinks her younger sister is headed down the wrong path to nowhere! On top of that she's boy crazy.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Stop Spending My Money at the Strip Club
programme.desc: Aaliyah loves her man but had to put him on probation when she found out that he was cheating with strippers!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Your Mom Drugged Me so You'd Leave; Unlock: You Can't Delete Deceit
programme.desc: Shaunte comes from a big family, but when a man named Syrrome came out of nowhere claiming to be her brother, she immediately had doubts; Janae believes that her partner, Mykeah, is cheating on her with a man.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Is My Fiancé or My Best Friend Lying? Test Them Both!
programme.desc: The lie detector results are in and the truth is coming out! These guests say their loved ones are cheating behind their backs. But who cheated? How many times? And can they handle the results? All will be revealed on the today’s explosive MAURY.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: The DNA Test Will Prove I Don't Have 21 Kids!
programme.desc: Ellen and Claudia return for the third time to find out if Doug is the father. Then, did Valchas father Anisha and Rebeka’s babies? Were Amanda and Felix in a relationship as roommates and is Felix the father of her baby?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Shocking Maury Guests Return…Updates!
programme.desc: You've seen their wild DNA results. You've heard their shocking confessions. But what happened to these unforgettable guests after they left the studio.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 1 Man ... 2 Sisters ... Is He The Baby's Dad
programme.desc: Sylvia's in-laws want her out because they say she got pregnant from another man. She says they're being ridiculous and just trying to control their son. Her husband is caught in the middle and doesn't know where to turn!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 6 Men Tested...Will I Find My Baby's Father Today!
programme.desc: Shay and Lynn were both involved with Reg but now he denies that he's the father of both of their children. Then, Kim says that she'd rather her friend Matt be the father of her child than her husband.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 2 Cousin's Tested ... Who's the Baby's Dad?
programme.desc: These denying dad's may be in for a rude awakening when Maury reads these unbelievable results. But will these mothers finally be able to end their search? Plus, one woman brings 2 cousins in for a paternity test, will either be her baby's dad?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: My 14 Year Old Has A Pimp ... Wild Teens Confronted!
programme.desc: These teen girls are out of control. Their mothers are desperate for help. Some admit to doing drugs, having sex and even prostituting themselves. But can Maury's team of experts help them get their lives back on the right track before it's too late?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: This Test Will Tell…Do I really Have 10 Kids?
programme.desc: William believes that 2 of his 6 kids with ex-wife Nicole aren’t his! Our DNA tests reveal the truth!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: What Happened After the Results...Shocking Spring Updates!
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered what happens after the results are revealed? The drama from their first appearance on the show was intense. Today, the wildest guests of the year are back with shocking updates. The stories will blow you away!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm Psychic…I'll Prove You Cheated With My Mom!
programme.desc: Rose says she’s a psychic and knows that her man Joseph cheated on her with her mom, but who will she trust: the tarot cards, the boyfriend, or lie detector test? Although Richard’s girlfriend Nikesha is 5 times his size, he swears he never cheated!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Slept With My Husbands Best Friend
programme.desc: The men on today's MAURY swear they haven't been doing anything wrong. But their women suspect they've been lying and cheating and they want to know for sure. Lie detector tests are going to bring out the truth!

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Tacky Tow
programme.desc: Karen McMillan says she went to pick up a lunch order for her office workers, and parked her car, and had to kill about 15 minutes before her order was ready. She walked over to a department store, and when she came out, her truck was gone because the defendant towed it. Ivan Cortez says the plaintiff parked her car at the restaurant and then walked next door to the mall. There are 35 signs stating you can’t do that. He says he owes her nothing because what she did was illegal. He’s accused of a tacky tow.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Sold Me a Sick Dog!
programme.desc: Florence sues Lora, claiming the puppy she bought from her shop, Harley, was sick and cost $1,600 in vet bills. Lora insists the puppy was healthy at sale and denies responsibility for its condition after four months.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Fireworks Over a Faulty Stove
programme.desc: Cate sues Ann Rosa for $1,140, claiming Ann sold her a defective pellet stove, misrepresenting it as functional. Ann argues the stove worked when sold, and any issues are Cate’s responsibility.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Your Dog Killed My Dog!
programme.desc: Plaintiff Eva Aleman sues Nicholas Satriano after his pit bull killed her Yorkie, alleging he reneged on promises to cover cremation costs and replace her dog. Nicholas claims her dog was loose and provoked the fight.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Friendship Fireworks Over a Loan
programme.desc: Lenore Stellmacher sues her former friend, Elizabeth Ruiz, for $920, claiming she loaned her money that was never repaid. Elizabeth denies borrowing anything and accuses Lenore of being jealous of her new relationship.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Stole My Dog!
programme.desc: Christina is suing someone she's known for 8 years over money she claims he owes her for a French bulldog.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Twin Sent Dad To Jail
programme.desc: Ronquan and his twin brother Rashard have been in and out of foster care since they were young kids.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Cheating Husband Went Viral
programme.desc: Shamika’s video went viral after she caught her husband at a hotel with another woman on their anniversary!
